body:
Yes!  Here is the full formal reference:

Mackey, Chris. (2015). **Pan Climatic Humans : Shaping Thermal Habits in an Unconditioned Society**. Submitted to the MIT Department of Architecture and Building Technology in Partial Fulfillment of the Requirements for the Degree of Master of Architecture and Mater of Science In Building Technology. Massachusetts Institute of Technology. [http://hdl.handle.net/1721.1/99261](http://hdl.handle.net/1721.1/99261)



But you can use this shorter one for most cases:

Mackey, Chris. (2015). **Pan Climatic Humans : Shaping Thermal Habits in an Unconditioned Society**. Submitted for the Degree of Master of Architecture and Mater of Science In Building Technology. Massachusetts Institute of Technology. [http://hdl.handle.net/1721.1/99261](http://hdl.handle.net/1721.1/99261)
